name: pnp-powerapps-samples-power-apps-quality-assurance-assessment
title: PowerApps Quality Assurance Assessment
shortDescription: A Quality Assurance tool integrating with Power Platform Pipelines allowing users to conduct QA Assessments on solutions deployed to a QA Environment.
longDescription: Inspired by the ALM Accelerator by PowerCAT, This solution is built alongside Power Platform Pipelines accessing all deployed solutions within your designated QA Environment. When a solution is in QA, the user can create a QA Assessment for the project, assign it to other users, manage checklist items, and submit a final QA grade for the solution.

references.name: Create a component for canvas apps
references.description: Components are reusable building blocks for canvas apps so that app makers can create custom controls to use inside an app, or across apps using a component library

references.name: Overview of creating apps in Power Apps
references.description: Power Apps is a high-productivity development platform for business apps.

references.name: Power Apps canvas apps documentation
references.description: Design and build a business app from a canvas in Microsoft Power Apps with data from a variety of sources without writing any code using traditional programming languages, such as C#.
